Name: WordSpiral
About the game: It's you against WordSpiral for the highest score. Find words on the WordSpiral to eliminate them from the game board. Try to eliminate all the letters on the Spiral Board. Watch the Spiral Board shrink after each word is found. How many turns does it take to clear the board? THEN - ask WordSpiral to Solve the same board you just played and see how many words it is able to find. Features: Large word database: over 200,000 words Easy to learn, hard to master Enjoy exciting background music Itâ€™s you versus WordSpiral for the best word search score *** See website for full play instructions ***
